member.name: RGNDATAHEADER
member.summary: The RGNDATAHEADER structure describes the data returned by the function.

member.name: RGNDATAHEADER.dwSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the header.

member.name: RGNDATAHEADER.iType
member.summary: The type of region. This value must be RDH_RECTANGLES.

member.name: RGNDATAHEADER.nCount
member.summary: The number of rectangles that make up the region.

member.name: RGNDATAHEADER.nRgnSize
member.summary: The size of the buffer required to receive the structures that make up the region. If the size is not known, this member can be zero.

member.name: RGNDATAHEADER.rcBound
member.summary: A bounding rectangle for the region in logical units.
